name: Escape The UwUverse
description:
Galactic space pilots Kuiper and Callisto are on their way to the Universe Space Convention when their ship is mysteriously intercepted and sent crashing down onto an unknown planet. Waking up, Kuiper finds his boyfriend is nowhere to be found, and that his disappearance is more complicated than it initially seems...

Kuiper makes it his mission to find Callisto, repair their ship, and hopefully get to the convention after all.



UwUverse is a turn based, twin-stick shooter developed for Dare Academy within the space of a few months by Team Blu Cow.
